Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Action")]
[<System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Action")>]

summary.span: 活动内的可能执行路径。

span.span: A potential path of execution within a activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 和 。A contains a and an . 在元素执行开始时 ，所有元素中的所有触发器活动 都是计划的。At the beginning of a element's execution, all the trigger activities from all elements are scheduled. 当第一个 (最左端) 活动完成时，将计划相应的操作活动，并取消所有其他触发器活动。When the first (leftmost) activity completes, the corresponding action activity is scheduled, and all other trigger activities are canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 活动。The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 此示例来自 [使用 Pick 活动](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity) 示例。This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_Pick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_pick/cs/program.cs#1)]
